chapter.text: You wake up and find yourself staring at a moldy ceiling. ^1500You hear the sound of chip tune themes and effects. ^1500You sit up and are nearly blinded as your eyes adjust to the bright screens. ^1500You stand up. ^1500You can’t make out what any of these games are. ^1500They certainly aren’t familiar to you, despite how good some of these kids seem to be at them.
